variables.description: The name of the global secondary index. The index name can be 3 - 255                   characters long and have no character restrictions.
variables.name: IndexName

variables.description: The complete index key schema for the global secondary index, which consists of                   one or more pairs of attribute names and key types.
variables.name: KeySchema

variables.description: Attributes that are copied (projected) from the source table into the index.                   These attributes are in addition to the primary key attributes and index key                   attributes, which are automatically projected.
variables.name: Projection

variables.description: The provisioned throughput settings for the index.
variables.name: ProvisionedThroughput
